synopsis: Bell's back with a new adventure! When the powerful leader of the Apollo Familia takes notice of him, his life with his Goddess is under threat.
Apollo Familia has laid down their challenge, but Hestia refuses. Apollo tries to force her hand...
Bell goes to train for the War Game, and it's up to the rest of the party to rescue Lili. Hestia puts her plan into action, but Lili refuses to leave the Soma Familia.
It's time for the War Games, and the Hestia Family, and its new members, are ready. Can they defeat the entire Apollo Familia and save Bell from Apollo's clutches?

The Hestia Familia was victorious in their battle against Apollo, and now they've won a huge mansion and a giant pile of cash! Hestia sets out to recruit for the Familia, but there's something she's forgetting...
Bell is caught up in a new adventure that takes him to the seedy underbelly of Orario: the pleasure quarters.

With the help of Haruhime the Renard, Bell escapes from the Amazoness prostitutes. But he begins to wonder about Haruhime, who says she was forced to be a prostitute against her will and isn't worth being saved.
Bell decides he's going to get money in the dungeon to purchase Haruhime. But he runs into a trap when the Ishtar Familia decides to kidnap him.
With the true purpose of the ritual and the killing stone revealed, Bell decides that he's going to take any risk to save Haruhime.
